mapper.select: select shelf.id,shelf.company_cd, array_to_string(array_agg(areas.areaname),',') as areaName, shelf.shelf_name as shelfName, shelf.create_time as createTime, shelf.author_cd as authorCd from planocycle.shelf_name_mst shelf left join planocycle.shelf_name_area namearea on shelf.company_cd = namearea.company_cd and shelf.id = namearea.shelf_name_cd left join masterdb.areas areas on namearea.areacd = areas.areacd and areas.company_cd = namearea.company_cd where shelf.company_cd = #{conpanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and shelf.deleteflg=0 and namearea.deleteflg=0 group by shelf.id,shelf.company_cd, shelf.shelf_name ,shelf.create_time, shelf.author_cd order by shelf.id desc
select distinct (shelf_name),id,shelf_name from planocycle.shelf_name_mst where company_cd = #{conpanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 order by id desc

select shelf.id,shelf.company_cd, areas.areaname as areaName, shelf.shelf_name as shelfName, shelf.create_time as createTime, shelf.author_cd as authorCd from planocycle.shelf_name_mst shelf left join masterdb.areas areas on shelf.area = areas.areacd where shelf.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and shelf.deleteflg=0 and areas.deleteflg=0

SELECT id+1000000 as id,0 as pId,cast(id as text)||'_0' as value,shelf_name as title FROM planocycle.shelf_name_mst as name where company_cd = #{companyCd} and exists (select shelf_name_cd from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst as pat where name.id = pat.shelf_name_cd and exists (select deleteflg from planocycle.shelf_pts_data_history as hst where pat.shelf_pattern_cd = hst.pattern_cd and hst.deleteflg = 0) and exists (select deleteflg from planocycle.shelf_pattern_branch as br where pat.shelf_pattern_cd=br.shelf_pattern_cd and deleteflg = 0 ) )
union all
SELECT shelf_pattern_cd as id,shelf_name_cd+1000000 as pId,cast(shelf_pattern_cd as text) as value,shelf_pattern_name as title FROM planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst pat where company_cd = #{companyCd} and exists (select deleteflg from planocycle.shelf_pts_data_history as hst where pat.shelf_pattern_cd = hst.pattern_cd and hst.deleteflg = 0) and exists (select deleteflg from planocycle.shelf_pattern_branch as br where pat.shelf_pattern_cd=br.shelf_pattern_cd and deleteflg = 0 ) order by pId
select shelf_pattern_cd from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst where shelf_name_cd = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteflg=0
